meta.job_title: Field Design and Analytics Associate Director

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a range of analytical projects leveraging cutting-edge analytics to provide commercial teams measurable insights into commercial strategies and tactics.
Work closely with Strategic Field Operations, brand teams, sales, forecasting, and other cross-functional business partners to understand opportunities and transform insights into business actions.
Develop a deep understanding of the BBU core markets and their data and analytical needs related to field force and omnichannel.
Generate insights relating to field force deployments (including omnichannel) that build a competitive advantage for the commercial organization.
Steward key aspects of the promo response modeling cycle, from definition of business questions to insight generation and communication.

Facilitate the embedding of analytics products into business processes and serve as a subject matter expert to internal stakeholders on the use of advanced analytics and field-related insight generation.
Manage internal analytics product owners and 3rd party vendors to prioritize workload and identify the right analytics approach for the business question at hand.

education_certification.credential: Quantitative Master’s or PhD degree from an accredited college or university in Engineering, Operations Research, Management Science, Economics, Statistics, Math, Physics, Computer Science, or Data Science.
